element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text:
This algorithm creates a new vector layer with random geometries.
The extent of the area to cover with the graticule should be selected in the "Output region" tab.

element.name: XMIN
element.text: Min X coordinate of the valid region (inside of which feature will be added)

element.name: XMAX
element.text: Max X coordinate of the valid region (inside of which feature will be added)

element.name: YMIN
element.text: Min Y coordinate of the valid region (inside of which feature will be added)

element.name: YMAX
element.text: Max Y coordinate of the valid region (inside of which feature will be added)

element.name: COUNT
element.text: The number of features to add to the layer.

element.name: TYPE
element.text: The type of geometries to add: *Points *Lines *Polygons

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The resulting layer with random geometries. The attributes table just contains an "ID" field for each feature.
